header_text: You are invited to an event and decide to wear a new outfit that is not your typical style. The next day you see that your photograph has been posted on a social media website. The thought of everyone seeing your photo makes you feel embarrassed.

elements.Text: Are you looking forward to others seeing your picture on the website?

elements.name: You are invited to an event and decide to wear a new outfit that is not your typical style. The next day you see that your photograph has been posted on a social media website. The thought of everyone seeing your photo makes you feel embarrassed. _Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
